extension-point.name: directories
extension-point.documentation:
This extension point can be used to register new resilient directories. The extension must contain only one master source for one or many number of slave directories declarations of the form:
...
...
Where each referenced subDirectory must be declared in an extension point. Pre-requisite to add a resilient directory: - One master only - At least one slave in write mode - The slave's schema must be the same than the master - The slave must used the same idField/passworField than the master - All SQL sub directory must not use auto-increment id All master definitions (schema,mode,fields) will be used as the resilient definitions. No need to duplicate definition in the resilient
